Contact
 

This information platform is brought to you by the research data management team of the Max Planck Digital Library. 

 

Max Planck Digital Library
Amalienstraße 33
80799 München
www.mpdl.mpg.de

rdm [at] mpdl [dot] mpg [dot] de

 

Individual services can be contacted via [servicename] [at] mpdl [dot] mpg [dot] de; e.g. edmond [at] mpdl [dot] mpg [dot] de.

 

If you have any issues concerning research data management beyond that feel free to contact us!

 
Roadshows

We are happy to visit your Max Planck Institute to present our service portfolio and answer questions on these services as well as other specific research data management questions. Roadshows can also be held remotely.
